title: Strategic Planning and Change Management
description: A structured learning pathway focused on strategic planning and change management. Participants will explore leadership theories, develop strategic thinking skills, and learn to lead organizational change effectively.
alt: Thumbnail showing a leader presenting a strategic plan to a team

title: Coaching Skills for Leaders
description: An eLearning module designed to teach leaders effective coaching techniques to empower their teams.
alt: Thumbnail showing two colleagues engaged in a coaching session

title: Influencing Stakeholders
description: A podcast series exploring strategies to build influence and trust with key stakeholders.
alt: Thumbnail showing a professional discussing ideas with stakeholders

title: Time Management for Leaders
description: An eBook providing actionable tips for leaders to manage their time effectively.
alt: Thumbnail showing a clock and a notebook on a desk

title: Resilience in Leadership
description: A video exploring how leaders can build resilience in themselves and their teams.
alt: Thumbnail showing a leader addressing challenges with confidence

title: Effective Communication Strategies
description: A workshop on improving communication skills for leaders.
alt: Thumbnail showing a team engaged in a discussion

title: Managing Change in Organisations
description: A seminar discussing change management strategies for business success.
alt: Thumbnail showing a business leader adapting to change
